definitionGroups.group: Joint sovereignty over a territory by two or more countries. [from 18th c.]

entries.meaning: A region or territory under such rule.

definitionGroups.group: (US, Canada, Philippines) A building or complex of buildings that provides multiple residential units each of which is owned separately but whose grounds, structure, etc. (if any) are owned jointly. [from 20th c.]

entries.meaning: (US, Canada, Philippines) The system of ownership by which such condominiums operate
(US, Canada, Philippines) An individual unit (such as an apartment) in such a complex.
